org.ensor.robots.motors

Interface IComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoboClaw

    public interface IComponent
    This interface models a component of a robotic system. This interface mainly reports what types of capabilities the component provides.
    Author:
    jona

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IConfigurable getConfigurableInterface()
      This method returns the object associated with configuring this component.
      IMotor getMotorInterface()
      This method returns the IMotor interface associated with this object.
      IMotorWithEncoder getMotorWithEncoderInterface()
      This method returns the IMotorWithEncoder interface associated with this object.
      IServo getPositionServo()
      Returns the IServo interface for controlling the position of this servo.
      IServo getSpeedServo()
      Returns the speed servo associated with this object.
      ITemperatureSensor getTemperatureSensor()
      Returns the temperature sensor of this component.
